briefTitle: ALK21-003EXT: An Extension of Study ALK21-003 (NCT01218958) to Test the Long-term Safety of Medisorb® Naltrexone (VIVITROL®)
officialTitle: A Multicenter Double-Blind Extension of Alkermes Study ALK21-003 to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety of Medisorb® Naltrexone
summary: This was a Phase 3 multicenter extension of Alkermes' Study ALK21-003 (NCT01218958 \[the base study\]) that evaluated the safety of Medisorb® naltrexone (VIVITROL®) administered every 4 weeks for 48 weeks (13 injections) in alcohol-dependent adults who had completed Study ALK21-003.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Reporting at Least 1 Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE) While in Study
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to 48 weeks (13 injections), not including base study
